mapper.select: select er.rulesNum,su.usersNum,dm.decisionsNum from (select count(*) as rulesNum from engine_rules where unique_code = #{id})as er, (select count(*) as usersNum from sys_user where unique_code = #{id}) as su, (select count(*) as decisionsNum from decision_model where user_id = #{id}) as dm;

select su1.num as cmpNum,su2.num as userNum,sl.num as activeUsersNum from (select count(*) as num from sys_user where id = unique_code) as su1, (select count(*) as num from sys_user) as su2, (select count(*) as num from (select *,count(*) as num1 from sys_login_log where createtime > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 30 DAY) group by userid,username) as sl where sl.num1 >= 1) as sl;

select t2.name,t1.num from (select unique_code,count(*) as num from sys_user where create_time between DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{dayNum} DAY) and NOW() group by unique_code order by num desc limit 10 ) t1 left join (select unique_code,name from sys_user where unique_code=id) as t2 on t2.unique_code = t1.unique_code;

select DATE_FORMAT(create_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as time ,count(*) as num from sys_user where create_time between DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL ${dayNum} DAY) and NOW() group by
DATE_FORMAT(create_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H-00-00")
DATE_FORMAT(create_time,"%Y-%m-%d 00-00-00")

select cmp.cmpNum,usr.userNum from (select count(distinct userid) as userNum from sys_login_log where createtime > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{dayNum} DAY)) as usr, (select count(distinct userid) as cmpNum from (select sl.userid,sl.createtime,su.username from sys_login_log sl left join sys_user su on sl.userid=su.id where userid = unique_code) as loginCmp where loginCmp.createtime BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{dayNum} DAY) and NOW()) as cmp;

select t2.name,t1.num from (SELECT unique_code,count(*) as num from sys_login_log sl LEFT JOIN sys_user as su on sl.userid = su.id WHERE createtime between DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{num} DAY) and NOW() group by unique_code ORDER BY num desc LIMIT 10) t1 left join (select unique_code,name from sys_user where unique_code=id) as t2 on t2.unique_code = t1.unique_code;
